context: Are you looking for a movie to watch today?
Cool. What kind of movie would you like to see?
I'm looking for something fun like One Crazy Summer (1986) or Better Off Dead (1985)
That is an oldie but goody!
yes. I grew up in the 80s and love those type of movies.
I was actually about to say Better Off Dead (1985) . Haha.
You would probably like Risky Business (1983) . Tom Cruise doing Bob Segar in his underwear. Doesn't get much better than that.
haven't seen that one in forever it is a great movie
resp: And, you would like Grosse Pointe Blank (1997) , of course. It has John Cusak.
